title: Digital Dukan (Surat Textile Catalog)
description: A high-performance textile catalog and inquiry platform built to replace bulky WhatsApp catalogs.
key_features: Flask-based backend for fast global access
Automated image compression using Pillow with 90% size reduction via WebP
Direct WhatsApp inquiry integration for lead generation
Secure admin dashboard for non-technical traders

title: ClickMart E-Commerce Website
description: A full-stack e-commerce web application with modern UI and secure authentication.
key_features: Product listings and shopping cart system
